alert.note: Alert for Comanche (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 03 at 10:22PM CDT until April 03 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Comanche County in southwestern Oklahoma... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 1022 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles east of Medicine Park, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported quarter size hail near Medicine Park. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Northeastern Lawton, Elgin, Sterling, Medicine Park and eastern Fort Sill. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
